sec.title: Basic items for OMS
sec.p: Basic items for OMS reflect items not included in the requirements related to the structure of iso:pub:std:DIS:69426ISO 50001,which are addressed by the Basic SMS items (see clause ).

non-normative-note.p: The score of items related to operation improving the organizations’ energy performance directly is two points and score for other items is one point.

sec.p: The organization should evaluate their EnMS according to the basic items for OMS. To conduct the evaluation the organization should assess if the organization’s EnMS has attained each evaluation criteria item. When the EnMS attains the item, the organization gets a score for that item. After checking all items in , the score for basic OMS items is calculated using the total score of all attained items.
